items.title: Trump's Auto Tariffs: These Indian companies will be most affected, should investors avoid them?
items.description: India exported $3.67 billion worth of automotive components to the US during H1FY25

items.title: Sebi probes insider trading at IndusInd Bank: Report
items.description: SEBI is also examining whether IndusInd violated its disclosure norms, the report said

items.title: Sky Gold: Will the glowing performance continue?
items.description: Jewellery demand is back after a brief lull following the price spike

items.title: Neogen Chemicals at a crucial juncture despite the fire accident
items.description: Neogen is making bold strides into the growing battery chemicals space, eyeing exponential growth in a rapidly expanding market. However, challenges on the path to scale-up and key industry dynamics are shaping its journey.

items.title: Fentanyl: An explainer on the deadly opioid, Trump’s war and India's role
items.description: India with its vast pharmaceutical and chemical industries is an emerging source for fentanyl precursor chemicals. Mexican cartels purchase the precursors to make fentanyl which is shipped to the US.
